title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore       Eastern National Our bookstore is operated by Eastern National, a cooperating agency that partners with Saratoga National Historical Park to provide books, educational toys, and gifts that delight, inform, and inspire.  Located in the park's Visitor Center, Eastern National Bookstore is open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, seven days a week. Like the Visitor Center, it is closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day. The bookstore can be reached by calling 518-670-2985 (also the park Information Desk). Eastern National also has a website for online browsing.
